attributes.action: take action in protecting the environment and make it the main priority for the government to deal with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state of the environment is affecting everything in our modern world. Regardless of who you are, you can't deny that the environment is a huge problem in our society, and the issues should be raised immediately at parliament before we end up with dire consequences. We need to face the facts, NOW. Please sign.
